1.12.2.1.3.6:
* Arrows which hit ground and are on fire sets the ground to fire
* TNT placed adjacent to lava and magma block ignites itself
1.12.2.1.4.5:
* Fix fire arrows being able to replace blocks above on hit
* Added support for enchantment description mod
1.12.2.1.4.8: *Fix a crash with iron chest and ZAWA.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5: Rewrote the entire mod and it adds config option for everything.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.1: Added recipe book support and fixed better chest recipe
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.5.2:
Fixed server crash.
Fixed pedestal not having a recipe.
Fixed pedestal TileEntity not registering.
1.12.2.1.14.4-1.5.8:
Crafting pad now only stacks 1.
Fixed grass block placing itself.
1.12.2.1.14.4-1.5.9:
Fixed sit now obeying config.
Fixed crash when placing lily pad.
1.12.2.1.14.4-1.5.10:
Updated BG translation.
Fixed not able throw the last dynamite.
Fix being able to sit when a block is above the slab/stair.
1.12.2.1.14.4-1.5.11: Siphon and Blazing enchantment now works

1.15.2.1.15.2-1.5.15: Tools with blazing now again drops non smeltable blocks
1.15.2.1.15.2-1.5.16: Stored XP in an furnace now drops when broken.

Added ru_ru.json.

Fixed incorrect sizing of items in pedestal.

Reimplement self planting.

Fixed /give giving an extra item.
